1.description: Judy Hopps, the first rabbit to join the city police force, is determined to solve a dangerous case. Despite, everyone's lack of belief in her abilities.
1.subTitle: 2018 • 2h 14m • 4 Languages • U/A 13+ • Genre: Super-hero | Action | Dark-Humor | Technology.
1.title: Zootopia

2.description: When Mirabel, the only ordinary member of the Madrigal family, discovers the magic surrounding their home is in danger, she may be her family’s last hope.
2.subTitle: 2021 • 1h 42m • 4 Languages • U/A 7+ • Genre: Animation, Musical, Fantasy, Adventure.
2.title: Encanto
